document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5868ff">good </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40d474">Flower </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#889098">Man </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#90688c">possess </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">first </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c4ff">present </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c4ff">Certificate </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a074ff">minted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec4c">Holiness. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
